channel.title: Adding banking
channel.description: Im starting a server from scratch. It has no banking , nothing at all. How can I add banking?

item.title: Adding banking
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“EzioAuditori, post:3, topic:387245”]Chances are you’re going to ask for help on everything else you do also.
I recommend you don’t start one from scratch until you know what your doing.[/quote]

This,

And banking isn’t really that complicated, If you can’t do something fairly simple like this then I would advise brushing up your Java and practicing with much smaller projects until you are ready to design a whole RuneScape look-a-like game.

Read full topic
